effect.l2complements.bleed.desc: Make the entity lose attack and speed, and damage the entity every 3 seconds. Stacks when applied.
effect.l2complements.bleed.description: Make the entity lose attack and speed, and damage the entity every 3 seconds. Stacks when applied.
effect.l2complements.cleanse.desc: Clear all potion effects and make the entity immune to potion effects.
effect.l2complements.cleanse.description: Clear all potion effects and make the entity immune to potion effects.
effect.l2complements.emerald_splash.desc: Attack all surrounding enemies. Damage is based on currently player stats and weapons.
Attack all surrounding enemies. Damage is based on currently player stats and weapons.
effect.l2complements.frost.desc: Slow down entity, and freeze them as if they are on powdered snow.
effect.l2complements.frost.description: Slow down entity, and freeze them as if they are on powdered snow.
effect.l2complements.incarceration.desc: Immobilize the entity. Making it cannot move and unaffected by external forces.
effect.l2complements.incarceration.descr: Immobilize the entity. Making it cannot move and unaffected by external forces.
effect.l2complements.soul_burning.desc: Continuously damage the entity. Bypass fire resistance.
effect.l2complements.soul_burning.descri: Continuously damage the entity. Bypass fire resistance.
enchantment.l2complements.dampened.desc: Cancel all vibrations emitted by wearer
enchantment.l2complements.ender_mask.des: Enderman won't be mad at you for direct eye contact
enchantment.l2complements.ender_transpor: Teleport mined items and mob drops to inventory if possible.
enchantment.l2complements.environment_im: Makes wearer immune to damage without attacker.
enchantment.l2complements.eternal.desc: Item will ignore all durability damage
enchantment.l2complements.explosion_immu: Makes wearer immune to explosion damage.
Puts down fire. Makes wearer immune to fire damage.
enchantment.l2complements.friendly_fire_: Makes wearer immune to damage from its owner and followers.
enchantment.l2complements.hardened.desc: Durability loss will be capped to 1.
enchantment.l2complements.invincible.des: Makes wearer immune to all damage.
enchantment.l2complements.life_mending.d: When healing, cost heal amount to repair item durability.
enchantment.l2complements.life_sync.desc: Cost health instead of durability when possible. May kill the user
enchantment.l2complements.magic_immunity: Makes wearer immune to magic damage.
enchantment.l2complements.planar_chunk_e: Dig 16x16 chunk-aligned blocks at once for %s layers
enchantment.l2complements.projectile_imm: Deflects all projectiles. Make wearer immune to projectile damage.
enchantment.l2complements.safeguard.desc: when item has more than 1 durability, it will keep at least 1 durability when damaged
enchantment.l2complements.sharp_blade.de: Stack %s on target, up to %s level.
enchantment.l2complements.smelt_touch.de: Smelt mined items and mob drops if possible, including items in chests!
enchantment.l2complements.snow_walker.de: Allow Wearer to walk on powdered snow.
enchantment.l2complements.stable_body.de: Player won't be knocked back when wearing chestplate with this enchantment.
enchantment.l2complements.transparent.de: Items become invisible when player has invisibility effect
enchantment.l2complements.vien_mining.de: Dig connected blocks of the same type, up to %s blocks
enchantment.l2complements.void_touch.des: Have %s chance to deal true damage. +%s chance if the damage bypasses armor or magic already.
l2complements.configuration.belowVoid.to:
Blocks below min build height for void eye drop
 Default: 16
 Range: 0 ~ 128
l2complements.configuration.blackFireCha: Black Fire Charge effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.bleedEnchant: Sharp Blade: Base effect duration in ticks
Sharp Blade: Max effect level per enchantment level
l2complements.configuration.chainDigging:
Max number of blocks to break per tick in delayed breaking
 Default: 16
 Range: 1 ~ 1024

Max number of blocks to break before resort to delayed breaking
 Default: 64
 Range: 1 ~ 1024

Max hardness blocks to break may have, as a factor of the hardness of the block broken.
Apotheosis implementation of chain digging use 3 has their hardness factor.
 Default: 3.0
 Range: 1.0 ~ 100.0
l2complements.configuration.cleansePredi:
- ALL: for clearing everything
- EXCEPT_BENEFICIAL: for clearing neutral and negative only
- HARMFUL_ONLY: for clearing negative only
Allowed Values: ALL, EXCEPT_BENEFICIAL, HARMFUL_ONLY
l2complements.configuration.curseEnchant: Cursed Blade: Base effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.delayDigging: Delayed breaking requires Ender Transport to take effect to reduce lag
l2complements.configuration.enableImmuni: Be sure to inform players when you turn this off
l2complements.configuration.enableSpawnE: Allow spawn eggs to be crafted with L2Complements materials
l2complements.configuration.enableToolRe: Allow tools to be upgraded from tools with same type but different materials
l2complements.configuration.enableVanill: Allow vanilla items such as elytra and ancient debris to be crafted with L2Complements materials
l2complements.configuration.eternalTotem: Cool down of Eternal Totem of Dream
Eternal Totem of Dream giving you warp stone
l2complements.configuration.flameEnchant: Hell Fire Blade: effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.hellfireWand: Hellfire Wand Damage per second charged (max 3 seconds charged)
l2complements.configuration.iceEnchantDu: Freezing Blade: Base effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.lifeSyncFact: Life Sync: Damage to user per durability cost
l2complements.configuration.mobTypeBonus: Bonus damage factor for effective targets

This is for weapons made with totemic gold and poseidite.
When weapons with above materials is used against mob types they are effective for
This number determines the bonus in percentage of original damage
 Default: 1.0
 Range: 0.0 ~ 1000.0
l2complements.configuration.phantomHeigh:
Blocks above max build height for sun membrane drop
 Default: 200
 Range: 0 ~ 10000
l2complements.configuration.renderEnchOv: Render a colored char on enchantment book to tell it apart from vanilla ones
l2complements.configuration.soulFireChar: Soul Fire Charge effect duration in ticks
l2complements.configuration.spaceShardDr:
- Allow: Space Shard is enabled
- Default: When certain mods are installed, Space Shard will be banned
- Deny: Space Shard is banned
Allowed Values: ALLOW, DEFAULT, DENY
l2complements.configuration.strongFireCh:
Power: 2 for Ghast, 3 for Creeper, 4 for TNT, 5 for beds, 6 for End Crystal
 Default: 2
 Range: 1 ~ 10
l2complements.configuration.title: L2Complements Configuration
l2complements.configuration.totemicHealD: Totemic Armor healing interval in ticks
l2complements.configuration.treeChopMaxB:
Max number of blocks to be considered for tree chopping.
 Default: 1024
 Range: 0 ~ 16384
l2complements.configuration.treeChopMaxH:
Max height for blocks to be considered for tree chopping.
 Default: 256
 Range: 0 ~ 512
l2complements.configuration.treeChopMaxR:
Max radius for blocks to be considered for tree chopping, except upward direction
 Default: 16
 Range: 0 ~ 32
l2complements.configuration.useArsNouvea: When Ars Nouveau is present, use apparatus recipe for enchantments
l2complements.configuration.voidTouchCha: Void Touch: Chance for true damage
Void Touch: extra chance when damage already bypass armor or magic
l2complements.configuration.windSpeed.to:
Requirement for obtaining Captured Wind. Unit: Block per Tick
 Default: 10.0
 Range: 0.1 ~ 100.0
l2complements.configuration.windSweepInc: Wind Sweep: Hit box increment per level
l2complements.jei.burnt.title: Burning
l2complements.jei.diffuse.title: Diffusion
l2complements.msg.delay_warning: Your tool needs %s to break more than %s blocks
l2complements.title: L2Complements
l2complements.tooltip.ench.tree: Breaks leaves as well, and doesn't cost durability when breaking leaves
l2complements.tooltip.misc.arrow_kill: Obtained by killing a %s with arrow.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.captured_wind: Obtained by flying faster than %s blocks per second while having [%s] in hand or inventory.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.charge_throw: Right click to throw at target
l2complements.tooltip.misc.diffusion_wan: Right click a block of gem/dust to diffuse it into nearby stones to create ore. Check JEI for recipe
l2complements.tooltip.misc.effect_kill: Obtained by killing a %s with %s effect.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.explosion_cha: Create explosion of level %s on Hit
l2complements.tooltip.misc.explosion_kil: Obtained by killing a %s with explosion.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.explosion_sha: Obtained by surviving an explosion damage of at least %s.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.float: This item will float in the air.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.hard_ice: Obtained by killing a %s with Powdered Snow.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.hellfire_wand: Hold use to start. Gradually grows a ring of fire on target position. On release, damage all mobs inside the ring.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.player_kill: Dropped when %s is killed by player.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.resonant_feat: Obtained when a %s survives a sonic boom attack.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.sonic_shooter: Hold use to charge. Shoot sonic boom automatically when charged to full. Damage all mobs in front of you.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.space_shard: Obtained by causing a projectile damage of at least %s.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.strike_kill: Dropped when %s is killed by lightning strike.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.sun_membrane: Obtained by killing a sun-burning %s that is %s blocks above max build height.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.totem_dream: Return players back to home when triggers, and becomes a fragile warp stone to go back. Valid against void damage. Also heal player to full health.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.totem_eternal: Reusable Totem of Dream with cool down of %s seconds
l2complements.tooltip.misc.totem_sea: It's stackable, but can only be triggered when in water or rain.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.transform_run: Right click %s to turn it into %s.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.void_eye: Obtained by killing an angry %s that is %s blocks into the void. This item kill holder in void, collect it with care.
l2complements.tooltip.misc.warp_record: Right click to record position. After that, right click to teleport. Durability: %s
l2complements.tooltip.misc.warp_teleport: Right click in inventory or UI to teleport. Durability: %s
l2complements.tooltip.misc.winterstorm_w: Hold use to create a ring of storm. Push mobs away and freeze them.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.poseidite_arm: When user is in rain or water: provides extra protection, walk/swim speed boost, and conduit/dolphin grace effect.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.poseidite_too: Sharper and faster when user is in rain or water. Effective against water based mobs and mobs sensitive to water.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.sculkium_armo: Dampened: When wearing 4 pieces of armors with dampened effect, cancel all vibrations emitted by wearer.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.sculkium_tool: Breaks all breakable blocks for the same speed. Be aware of the breaking level.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.shulkerate_to: Really durable. Not easily damaged. Increase Reach and Attack distance
l2complements.tooltip.tool.totemic_armor: Heal user when damaged. Regenerate health over time.
l2complements.tooltip.tool.totemic_tool: Heal user when used. Effective against undead mobs.
